title: "Mesmer's technique for energizing the body and resolving issues"
first_phrase: In the first part of this text, the physiology of glucose digestion is explored through the different points in the body where it passes. The vis vitalis, or vital force, is discussed and how it energizes the body. In the last 200 tokens, we learn about Mesmer's techniques and the concept of energy in his practice. The points he would touch on his patients are examined, including the solar plexus, navel, and kidneys, and their relation to digestion and blood purification. This leads to the question of whether Mesmer's methodology can be applied to psychological issues, which will be explored in the following pages. The three levels of the body and the triadic mind are also discussed.

last_phrase: In conclusion, by connecting with the earth, releasing our mental constructs, and focusing on specific points related to digestion and blood purification, we can effectively address physical and psychological issues. This triad process involves targeting the vegetative system, the circulatory system, and the brain, ultimately leading to a healthier mind and body.
